item.title: My Step 1 experience
item.description: How I passed Step 1 after 8 months of medical school using only Anking and UWorld.

item.title: Research
item.description: View my Google Scholar here. First-author publications R. Chen, G. Rocheleau, (…), R. Do. Genetic analyses of eight complex diseases using predicted continuous representations of disease. Provisionally accepted at Cell Reports Methods. [S. M. Cho, M. Levin, R. Chen][equal contribution], (…), R. Do, P. Natarajan. AHA PREVENT equations and cardiovascular disease risk in diverse healthcare populations. Accepted at JACC. R. Chen, B. O. Petrazzini, (…), R. Do. Trans-ancestral rare variant association study with machine learning-based phenotyping for metabolic dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease.
